Class BlockStateBuilder.Variant

java.lang.Object

Enclosing class:
BlockStateBuilder
@Environment(CLIENT) public static final class BlockStateBuilder.Variant extends TypedJsonObject
Builder for a blockstate variant definition.

    • weight

      public BlockStateBuilder.Variant weight(int weight)
      Set the relative weight of this variant. This property will be ignored if the variant is not added with BlockStateBuilder.weightedVariant(java.lang.String, io.github.vampirestudios.artifice.api.builder.assets.BlockStateBuilder.Variant) or BlockStateBuilder.Case.weightedApply(io.github.vampirestudios.artifice.api.builder.assets.BlockStateBuilder.Variant).
